entry.title: next主题修改（适合小白）
entry.content: 经过两天的百度，博客终于改出一个比较舒服的样子了，不过发现一个问题，网上关于HEXO的文章基本上都差不多，特别是主题美化的很少，下面我分享一下我的custom.styl，后期会继续添加，希望对小白们有帮助~ 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768697071727374757677787980818283// Custom styles.//背景body { background:url(https://source.unsplash.com/a7fr9EcQRw0); background-size:cover; background-repeat:no-repeat; background-attachment:fixed; background-position:center;}//文章阴影圆角.post { background: #fff; margin-bottom: 50px; opacity: 0.8; border-radius: 10px; padding: 30px; -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(202, 203, 203, .5); -moz-box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(202, 203, 204, .5); }//分割线隐藏 .posts-expand .post-eof { margin: 0px; background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0); }//页面留白修改.header-inner { padding-top: 80px; padding-bottom: 20px;}.posts-expand { padding-top: 10px;}.posts-expand .post-meta { margin: 5px 0px 0px 0px;}.post-button { margin-top: 0px;}// 文章底部的tags.posts-expand .post-tags a { border-bottom: none; margin-right: 0px; font-size: 13px; padding: 0px 5px; border-radius: 3px; transition-duration: 0.2s; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; transition-delay: 0s;}.posts-expand .post-tags a:hover { background: #eee;}// 自定义页面和文章效果一致.page { background:rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8); border-radius: 10px; padding: 30px; -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(202, 203, 203, .5); -moz-box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(202, 203, 204, .5);}//评论背景.comments { background:rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8); border-radius: 10px; margin: 50px 0px 0px 0px; padding: 30px; -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(202, 203, 203, .5); -moz-box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(202, 203, 204, .5);}@media (max-width: 767px) { .comments { margin: 50px 20px 0px 20px; }}
